purchase: Here you can order advertising on taxi monitors. The minimum number of devices is 10 monitors, the minimum advertising placement period is 7 days. More details at the link. How many people will see your ad
how_many_people: How many people will see your ad
link_to_your_site: People will go to your website or social networks
how_many_people_text: In one car per day, about 30 people will see your advertisement. Thus, by ordering 1 slot (10 cars) for 7 days, you will reach an audience of approximately 2,100 people.
link_to_your_site_text: When ordering advertising with us, we will create a QR code that leads to your website or social media page. The client will only need to scan the QR code and order your product or book your service.

steps.step2: 2. Log in to your personal account
steps.step3: 3. Upload an ad video and wait for approval and censorship.
steps.step3_1: 3.1. If you don't have an ad video, you can find the consultant's phone number in your personal account. Contact your consultant and order video production.
steps.step4: 4. Choose a city and the number of slots
steps.step6: 6. Get ready to receive orders from clients

minRequirement: Minimum number of devices: 10 monitors. Minimum advertising period: 7 days. More details via the link.
viewsCount: How many people will see your ad?
Upload_your_video: Upload your new video and wait approval
